name: dropdown-menu
author: xMrAfonso
preview: A reusable dropdown menu component with customizable items and button variants.

props.name: label
props.description: The text displayed on the dropdown trigger button

props.name: items
props.description: Array of menu items with label and action properties. Each item should have a 'label' (String) and optional 'action' (Function) callback
props.default: [{ label: 'Profile', action: () => console.log('Profile clicked') }, { label: 'Settings', action: () => console.log('Settings clicked') }, { label: 'Logout', action: () => console.log('Logout clicked') }]
